Elder Spiron:
Elmore is a kingdom of Humans which dominates the northern part of the continent. They are, as a rule, unpleasent fellows who think Dwarves are inferior. They have all too often, in actuality to meddle in out domestic administration and antagonize us in many ways. But now we have many treaties, so they dont bother us anymore.
Of course, the Kingdom of the Dwarves pays tribute to the Kingdom of Elmore, but that is only fair because Elmore prevents the Orcs, who can always invade us from the west, from attacking us.
